However, by the time Botan finds Yusuke, she's too weak to explain the situation. Yusuke and his friends are left in the dark about the new enemy, but not for long. Soon it is a battle for Earth between mere Spirit Detectives and the almighty king of the Netherworld.","poster_path":"/a0KGBLZXJ3riF0UJaZRxTGoVUEt.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,14,28],"popularity":16.008,"release_date":"1994-04-09","video":false,"vote_average":7.7,"vote_count":55},{"backdrop_path":"/tvzGlFkOHApPOckWN7PSNScGDbx.jpg","id":177203,"title":"The Challenger","original_title":"The Challenger","overview":"When the space shuttle Challenger blew up in 1986, it was the most shocking event in the history of American spaceflight. But what was more shocking was that the cause of the disaster might never be uncovered.
